metadata.title: CVE-2015-2270 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: lib/moodlelib.php in Moodle through 2.5.9, 2.6.x before 2.6.9, 2.7.x before2.7.6, and 2.8.x before 2.8.4, when the theme uses the blocks-regionsfeature, establishes the course state at an incorrect point in thelogin-validation process, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitivecourse information via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
